formattedAddress: 333 Hudson St #202, New York, NY 10013, USA
adrFormatAddress: 333 Hudson St #202, New York, NY 10013, USA

originalText.text: I have had a positive relationship with Cathy and SOFT since the early 1990s. For two years, beginning in 2014, I worked through SOFT as a contractor. My experience could not have been better. I appreciate their business connections, professionalism and, when I needed it, their support.

text.text: I have had a positive relationship with Cathy and SOFT since the early 1990s. For two years, beginning in 2014, I worked through SOFT as a contractor. My experience could not have been better. I appreciate their business connections, professionalism and, when I needed it, their support.

originalText.text: I was lucky enough to be contacted and then work with SOFT this past year and it has turned out to be the best decision I could have possibly made.  From the very start and all the way into the front door of my new career, SOFT has continued to support my transition.  They are very professional and unbelievably responsive each and every time I called or emailed their team.  I was privileged to work with Catherine, Bonnie and Dallin and I give my full recommendation for SOFT.

text.text: I was lucky enough to be contacted and then work with SOFT this past year and it has turned out to be the best decision I could have possibly made.  From the very start and all the way into the front door of my new career, SOFT has continued to support my transition. originalText.text:
Very professional + Ethical Business.
I would call it a boutique firm as their operations are of very high standards. They don’t just propose a consultant just because they want to fill a position or please a client.

I wish every firm out there should follow the same strategy and the consulting world will be a better place.

Cathy, Dallin and Bonnie all are awesome.
I have high respect for them. And wish them good luck in the years to come.

originalText.text: I worked with Dallin & Cathy on my first consultancy "Gig" after working for a software company for 30 years.  I found them very professional and they understood my position, providing great advice all though the assignment of 18 months. They were upfront, honest and always available when needed. I look forward to working with them again if at all possible.

text.text: I worked with Dallin & Cathy on my first consultancy "Gig" after working for a software company for 30 years.  I found them very professional and they understood my position, providing great advice all though the assignment of 18 months. They were upfront, honest and always available when needed. I look forward to working with them again if at all possible.

originalText.text: Here's the reality,  these guys are great, they take the time where others don't, they honestly care about their candidates and the clients they work with not just a pay check. They make every effort to do the right things by the people they work for and have withstood the test of time for the last 35+ years working in NYC. This company works with some of the most prestigious names in Manhattan and if you're fortunate enough to work with them,  you'll immediately see the difference. I've worked with them both as a client as well as a candidate for over 2 decades, so please do not take seriously any negative reviews, take the time to get to know them and you'll see what I already know.
